content.text: Match ends, Crystal Palace 0, Manchester City 0.
Second Half ends, Crystal Palace 0, Manchester City 0.
Attempt missed. Christian Benteke (Crystal Palace) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Andros Townsend with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Crystal Palace. Conceded by Danilo.
Attempt blocked. Yaya Touré (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Kevin De Bruyne went off injured after Manchester City had used all subs.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, Crystal Palace. Lee Chung-yong replaces Jason Puncheon because of an injury.
Delay in match Jason Puncheon (Crystal Palace) because of an injury.
Delay in match Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) because of an injury.
Jason Puncheon (Crystal Palace) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Martin Kelly (Crystal Palace) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Martin Kelly (Crystal Palace).
Leroy Sané (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Penalty saved! Luka Milivojevic (Crystal Palace) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the centre of the goal.
Fernandinho (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card.
Penalty conceded by Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) after a foul in the penalty area.
